steel-rangers/scout.about: We're the Steel Rangers. Chapter of the Crystal Empire. What's left of it anyway. We're still doing our duty, regardless.
steel-rangers/scout.ask-armor: How do I get my hooves in one of those shiny armor ?
steel-rangers/scout.ask-more-armor: How do you manage not to suffocate inside all that metal ?

bubbles.rangerLament#1: When will the elders give us something interesting to shoot at...
bubbles.talkToSarge: Don't talk to me. If you want social interaction, go bother the sergeant.

inspect.sergeant: You see a sergeant of the Steel Ranger.
